cause.description:
We are trying to find homes for animals, and also to find foster homes for animals until a good home is found for the animals. we are starting in Kawartha Lakes and York region, and wherever else we possibly can. If anyone else has any ideas to help please let us know
1. so many animals are going homeless, and could so easily be saved
2. animals are suppose to be mans best friend
cause.name: to rescue and find foster homes for animals
